Package com.example.sufferqr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommentPage
    the page of writing/deleteing page
    DashBoard
    This class is the dash board of the application it will have a short cut to camera, the total number of the score collected the total number of code been scanned, the highest score ever, and the score for the last code scanned.
    DashBoardTest
    Dashboard test
    DrawerBase
    This class is used to set up the base of the drawer functionality it will create the side bar drawer and navigate between activities.
    EditProfile
    allow user to edit their profile Change in username Change in email Change in privacy setting: allow other user to view owner email, qr id, and code scanned
    EmojiDraw
    Draws the visual representation of th QRcode
    EmojiDrawTest
    Tests the EmojiDraw class to make sure it functions properlu
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    GameQrRecordDB
    This is a class that connect with database GameQRRecord
    GameQRRecordDBTest
    database send testing
    Highest
    This class is the last part of the leader board of the application It will display a list of game-wide high unique QR code score.
    HighScorePlayer
    highest total scores user info saving highest unique QR code score user info saving
    HighScorePlayerList
    set up the item in Highest Total Score List and the item in Highest Unique QR Code Score List
    LeaderBoard
    leadboard for user and score
    LeaderBoardIntent
    leadboard testing
    LeaderPageAdapter
    leaderboard ViewPager adapter
    MapsActivity
    map that users location is shown marker that represents the nearby QR code when the marker is clicked, the QR code name and points are shown
    MapsActivity.MyClusterItem
    A class that represents a cluster item, which holds information about the position, title, and snippet of a marker on the map.
    MapsUnitTest
    1km distance true/false test
    MapTest
    nearby map testing
    NearByDisTest
    distance test
    nearbyQrCodeList
    a list for showing nearby qr list
    NearByQrCodeListTest
    nearby qr list testing
    OtherUser
    Other user profile contain all the info that this user allow other to view
    QrCode
    saving qrcode clss for nearby 1km qr
    QrCodeList
    qrcode nearby list each item uidrawing
    QRDetailActivity
    qr code details reviewing,including location,image,name,points.etc only the creator should able to access
    QRDetailHistoryTest
    qrcode details testing on each fragment
    QRQuickViewScrollingActivity
    ser edited QRcode content.same Qr,comment
    QuickViewTest
    qrcode details testing on each fragment
    RegisterPage
    This method is used to register page to the user and ask user to set up their user name give an email, choose an qr id, in order to create an account
    ScanCode
    reconize of qr code taken,and a photo of sorrounds and send to qrdetailactivity
    ScanHistory
    display scaned qrcode
    ScanHistoryTest
    qrcode scan history test
    ScoreCounter
    Calculates the total score that the player gets from a qrcode
    ScoreCountTest
    Test to see if the ScoreCounter functions properly
    search_location
    DialogFragment to search for a location using Google Places API invoke when user click on the search button
    SearchPlayer
    search player by username, blur search
    SearchPlayerAdapter
    set up adapter for search player
    Total
    This class is the first part of the leader board of the application It will display a list of game-wide high total score.
    User
    user info saving
    UserProfile
    This class contains all the user information, the total number of the score collected the total number of code been scanned, the highest score ever, and the lowest score with player's username, email, QR id and the QR code from QR id.
    userUITest
    user interface testing
